Introduction

Cheon Jun Hyeok is a South Korean idol under P Nation and a member of the boy group TNX. As a trainee, he appeared and competed in the SBS survival show "Loud" where he was recruited by Psy to join his first boy group, TNX. He made his official debut on May 17, 2022.
